seasons.title: The Man Who Would Be Bond

episodes.synopsis: Ian Fleming, a devilishly profligate and debonair playboy, takes a job in Naval Intelligence as the Second World War approaches.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As the war rages on, Fleming finds himself caught between two women. Eager for action, he sets off on a dangerous mission to France.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Fleming embarks on a tempestuous affair and persuades Godfrey to form the 30 Assault Unit, a group of the toughest soldiers prepared to play dirty.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With the war coming to an end, Fleming embarks on his most dangerous mission to date into the heart of enemy territory: Nazi Germany.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Fleming: The Man Who Would Be Bond
video.synopsis: Superspy James Bond emerged from the mind of writer Ian Fleming, whose own playboy ways and military life in World War II set the tone for his novels.
